channel.title: Comments on: Reporting Services Error: “The tablix has a detail member with inner members” (And How To Fix It)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: AnnB
item.dc:creator: AnnB
item.description: This works, but will not allow for grouping and page breaks...or at least I couldn't figure it out. This solution worked for me: Google this: Creating a master detail report in SSRS without using Sub report Nishant Rana (comment won't let me post link)
item.content:encoded:
This works, but will not allow for grouping and page breaks…or at least I couldn’t figure it out. This solution worked for me: Google this:
Creating a master detail report in SSRS without using Sub report Nishant Rana (comment won’t let me post link)

item.title: By: Vipert1000
item.dc:creator: Vipert1000
item.description: While creating a new row and copying is easy. Wouldn't selecting "Row Group" -> "Delete Group" be easier? Then when it asks you what you want to delete you can specify just the group (which leaves the contents of the row). I was using Visual Studio 2008 to get this feature.
item.content:encoded: While creating a new row and copying is easy. Wouldn’t selecting “Row Group” -> “Delete Group” be easier? Then when it asks you what you want to delete you can specify just the group (which leaves the contents of the row). I was using Visual Studio 2008 to get this feature.

item.title: By: Sourav
item.dc:creator: Sourav
item.description: Awesome workaround and nice explanation. Saved a lot of time. Thank you sir!
item.content:encoded: Awesome workaround and nice explanation. Saved a lot of time. Thank you sir!

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: I copied the cell in the header row, and pasted it into the detail row.
item.content:encoded: I copied the cell in the header row, and pasted it into the detail row.

item.title: By: Misha
item.dc:creator: Misha
item.description: What does this mean: "I move the detail information into the new row"... How do you move it?
item.content:encoded: What does this mean: “I move the detail information into the new row”… How do you move it?

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: Thank you! I don't work with SSRS on a day-to-day basis any longer. A good place to go for help would be the forums at SQLServerCentral.com or stackoverflow.com.
item.content:encoded: Thank you! I don’t work with SSRS on a day-to-day basis any longer. A good place to go for help would be the forums at SQLServerCentral.com or stackoverflow.com.
